name: Superdao
intro: An all-in-one platform to start, manage and grow a DAO
introduce: Superdao is an all-in-one platform to start, manage and grow a DAO. The SuperDao OS will enable for one-click DAO creation from pre-existing templates; maintain real-time status of DAO ownership. allocation plan, governance structure, etc; provide for treasury management along with voting and decsion making; and nurture an open ecosystem of third-party apps.
